sentences: Steve Christensen (born April 23, 1978) is a Grammy Award winning American recording engineer, record producer and musician.
Steve began his recording career in Houston, Texas at SugarHill Recording Studios in 1998 as an intern and quickly moved up to lead engineer by 2000.
Steve operates his own studio in downtown Houston, Texas.
